title: Chapter 896 - A Blacksmith
body:
Chapter 896 - A Blacksmith

She was dressed in gray, with her long hair tied up. Her appearance stood out of the crowd, unadorned yet extraordinary.

However, her disposition was far too icy.

Even You Xue could tell that the gray-robed woman looked a bit ill at ease, and she couldn’t help but find it strange.

But before she could process it, the woman in gray turned and dashed off.

“Fellow Daoist, who was that woman?” You Xue asked, a bit confused.

Were the woman an ordinary person, there’s no way You Xue would have cared.

But the woman in gray obviously recognized Su Yi. You Xue couldn’t help but wonder.

“The third libationer of Meng Po Palace. Her name is Yuan Linning,” Su Yi said casually. “She’s also the first Emperor I defeated after reincarnating.”

You Xue was briefly stunned. Then, she couldn’t help but laugh. “In that case, she ought to be honored. After all, not just any Emperor has the opportunity to lose to you, Fellow Daoist.”

Su Yi, however, frowned. Members of Meng Po Palace have come to Snowy Skies City too? Don’t tell me some of their Emperors are trapped in the Dark Capital too?

A moment later, he shook his head and gave the...
